long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find emails & cell phone numbers on LinkedIn and engage leads with 1-click with the LeadLoft email finder for LinkedIn.

HOW IT WORKS

1️⃣ Search LinkedIn

2️⃣ Click "Save" (Option to Auto-Engage)

3️⃣ Contact info appears in your dashboard.

EXPERT TIP: Select a Playbook to turn on our 1-click engage feature. 


USE IT TO

✅ Find Emails

✅ Find Cell Phone Numbers 

✅ Find & Engage with 1-Click

✅ Engage with Email, LinkedIn, and More

✅ Sync Prospects to your CRM


Ready to go? Get started at www.leadloft.com
